meanings.definition: (動物学) 二鰓亜綱の、または二鰓亜綱に属する
meanings.english_definition: (zoology) Belonging or pertaining to the Dipleurobranchiata.

meanings.definition: (動物学) 二鰓亜綱の動物
meanings.english_definition: (zoology) An animal belonging to the Dipleurobranchiata.

etymology.value: From *di-* (two), *pleuro-* (side), and *branchiate* (gilled). Refers to the arrangement of gills on both sides of the body.

readability_explanation.text: This is a highly specialized term used in zoology, specifically when discussing certain types of sea slugs. It is unlikely to be encountered outside of scientific or academic contexts related to marine biology or invertebrate zoology.
